titleStmt.title: The interpreter, or, Book containing the signification of words wherein is set forth the true meaning of all ... words and terms as are mentioned in the law-writers or statutes ... requiring any exposition or interpretation : a work not only profitable but necessary for such as desire thoroughly to be instructed in the knowledge of our laws, statutes, or other antiquities / collected by John Cowell ...
titleStmt.author: Cowell, John, 1554-1611.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F. Leach and are to be sold by Hen. Twyford, Tho. Dring, and Io. Place,

notesStmt.note: Wing calls this the third edition; third edition does not appear on t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard Law School Library.
